item.description:
The difference between healthy people vs. unhealthy people is education and information. Come to this meetup to learn you can be a healthier and a stronger you by:

• Preventing Disease
• Managing and/or eradicating existing diseases
• Giving you more energy
• Just living a healthier and longer lifestyle

Come see what’s bad for and what's good for you. If have or know anyone that suffers from:

Arthritis, Osteoporosis, Hypertension, Joint Injuries & Joint problems, Bone Spurs, Cancer's, Diabetes, Alzheimer’s, High Cholesterol, Asthma/Allergies, Fibromyalgia, ADD/ADHD…etc.

We will teach you how little changes in your eating habits can enhance your health and longevity as well as your families.

Just remember this phrase:
“It's Not What You Eat That Kills You; It's What You Don't Eat!”

We'll teach the importance of good solid nutrition.

**********************************************************************************
*******************************************************************a***************

FEATURING: Ancient Legacy Essential Oils with EMD Denise Neale!

This is going to be a lot of fun. Come learn what oils calm you, clear your mind, energize you and more...

See you all at this event.

RSVP with Bernadette Trafton at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Health Seminar Featuring Ancient Legacy Essential Oils with EMD Denise Neale!
